reviewText: Excellent doctor! Very thorough examination and took time to explain everything. The clinic was clean and staff was friendly. Highly recommend!
Good consultation. Doctor was knowledgeable but had to wait a bit longer than expected. Overall satisfied with the treatment.
Amazing experience! Dr. Rishi was very patient and understanding. The treatment was effective and I felt much better after the consultation.
Outstanding care! Dr. Sonia explained my heart condition in detail and provided excellent treatment. The cardiologist team was very professional.
Very good orthopedic doctor. Diagnosed my back pain quickly and prescribed effective treatment. The follow-up care was excellent.
The dermatologist was professional but the consultation felt a bit rushed. The skin treatment was effective though.
Great consultation! Dr. Rishi was very attentive and provided comprehensive care. Would definitely recommend to others.
Exceptional doctor! Very professional, took time to listen to all my concerns, and provided excellent treatment. Highly satisfied with the care received.
Good experience overall. Dr. Rishi is knowledgeable and the treatment was effective. The clinic staff was also very helpful.
Amazing doctor! Very caring and thorough in diagnosis. Explained everything clearly and made me feel comfortable throughout the consultation.
Great experience with the orthopedic consultation. Dr. Arjun provided excellent care and treatment advice.
